Package com.example.fusion0

Class GeoLocationTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.fusion0.GeoLocationTest
public class GeoLocationTest extends Object
GeoLocationTest This class tests the functionality of the GeoLocation class. It uses Android's instrumented testing framework to validate the behavior of GeoLocation with and without event data. The tests cover methods for setting and retrieving event and user locations, as well as determining whether a user can register based on proximity to the event location.

  • Constructor Details

    • GeoLocationTest

      public GeoLocationTest()

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Sets up the test environment. Initializes GeoLocation objects with and without event data by launching TestFragmentActivity

    • testConstructorWithEventLocation

      public void testConstructorWithEventLocation()
      Tests the constructor that initializes GeoLocation with event data. Validates that event latitude, longitude, and radius are correctly set.

    • testConstructorWithoutEventLocation

      public void testConstructorWithoutEventLocation()
      Tests the constructor that initializes GeoLocation without event data. Validates that default values (0.0) are assigned to event latitude and longitude.

    • testSetEventLocation

      public void testSetEventLocation()
      Tests the setEventLocation method. Verifies that the event location latitude and longitude are correctly updated.

    • testSetUserLocation

      public void testSetUserLocation()
      Tests the setUserLocation method. Validates that the user location latitude and longitude are correctly set.

    • testSetEventRadius

      public void testSetEventRadius()
      Tests the setEventRadius method. Verifies that the event radius is updated to the specified value.

    • testGetLocationWhenPermissionGranted

      public void testGetLocationWhenPermissionGranted()
      Tests user location retrieval when permissions are granted. Verifies that user location latitude and longitude are correctly retrieved.

    • testOnLocationChangedUpdatesUserLocation

      public void testOnLocationChangedUpdatesUserLocation()
      Tests the onLocationChanged method. Verifies that the user's location is updated when the location changes.

    • testCanRegisterWithinRadius

      public void testCanRegisterWithinRadius()
      Tests the canRegister method when the user is within the acceptable radius. Validates that the method returns true.

    • testCanRegisterOutsideRadius

      public void testCanRegisterOutsideRadius()
      Tests the canRegister method when the user is outside the acceptable radius. Validates that the method returns false.
